start.text: Welcome to my gallery! I'm always looking for fresh talent. Would you be interested in creating a portrait commission?

commission_accepted.text: Excellent! I need a portrait drawing. You'll need good drawing skills and the right materials. The client will pay $50 for quality work.

commission_in_progress.text: How's that portrait coming along? Remember, quality matters for building your reputation.

not_ready.text: That's fine. Practice your skills and come back when you're more confident. There's an art supply store nearby.

commission_complete.text: This portrait is fantastic! You have real talent. Here's your payment, and I'd like to discuss a gallery show opportunity.

options.text: Thank you! I'm interested in the gallery show.

gallery_opportunity.text: I host monthly shows for emerging artists. You'll need 3 high-quality pieces to participate. The exposure could launch your career!

gallery_opportunity_accepted.text: Glad to hear you're working on your portfolio! Come back when your three pieces are ready.

end.text: Best of luck with your artistic journey!

start.text: Welcome to ArtMart! We have everything an artist needs. What can I get you today?

options.text: I'd like to buy some supplies.

shop_menu.text: Here's what we have in stock:

buy_canvas_options.text: How many canvases would you like? Each costs $5.

buy_paper_options.text: How much paper would you like? Each costs $1.

buy_pencil_options.text: How many pencils would you like? Each costs $2.

buy_brush_options.text: How many paint brushes would you like? Each costs $8.

buy_watercolor_options.text: How many watercolor sets would you like? Each costs $15.

buy_oilpaint_options.text: How many oil paint sets would you like? Each costs $25.

start.text: Excuse me, traveler! I'm trying to find an old hermit said to live deep in the forest, but I'm lost. Can you help?

options.text: I can try to find them.

quest_accepted.text: Thank you! They say the forest entrance is somewhere to the north, beyond the supply store.

quest_completed.text: You found the hermit! Thank you so much. Take this for your troubles.

start.text: Welcome to The Creative Grind! Nothing fuels artistic inspiration like good coffee. What can I get you?

buy_coffee.text: One coffee coming up! This should give you the energy boost you need for your next masterpiece.

buy_espresso.text: Double shot espresso! This will definitely keep you going through those long painting sessions.

end.text: Enjoy, and may your creativity flow!

start.text: Ah, a young artist! I can see the passion in your eyes. Would you like to learn from someone who's been painting for 40 years?

mentorship_accepted.text: Excellent! First lesson: technique is important, but emotion is everything. Create something that moves people, not just something that looks pretty.

options.text: I understand. Thank you for the wisdom.

mentorship_completed_dialogue.text: You have learned all I can teach you for now, young artist. Go forth and create your own masterpieces!

end.text: Remember, art is not what you see, but what you make others see.

start.text: This ancient tree pulses with a strange energy. You notice a shimmering pigment at its base.

collected.text: You've collected the rare pigment. It feels valuable.

empty.text: The tree seems to have no more pigment to give for now.

not_eligible.text: The tree is beautiful, but you don't feel a need to interact with it right now.

start.text: A visitor? It's been ages. What brings a young artist like you to my quiet abode?

traveler_acknowledgment.text: Ah, that old wanderer. So you found me! Now that that's settled, perhaps you can help me with a small task. I need some rare pigment from the deepest part of the forest.

pigment_quest_accepted.text: The pigment is usually found near ancient trees. Bring it back to me.

pigment_quest_completed_ready_to_reward.text: This is it! The rare azure pigment. Your keen eye and persistence are commendable. Take this ancient brush; it will aid your painting skill.

end.text: May your artistic journey be long and fulfilling.

start.text: Welcome to the New York Art Academy! We offer classes in drawing, painting, and sculpture. Each wing specializes in different techniques.

class_info.text: Our drawing classes focus on fundamental techniques and observational skills. Painting classes cover watercolor, oils, and acrylics. Sculpture classes teach clay modeling and casting.

enrollment_info.text: Classes are $25 each and provide skill boosts plus valuable supplies. Visit each instructor to sign up for their specific workshops.

start.text: I teach fundamental drawing techniques. My workshop covers line quality, shading, and proportion. Would you like to take my class for $25?

options.text: Yes, I'd like to take the class.

take_class.text: Excellent! Here are some drawing exercises and techniques. Practice makes perfect!

start.text: I specialize in color theory and painting techniques. My workshop will teach you about mixing colors and brush control. Class fee is $25.

take_class.text: Wonderful! Color is the soul of painting. Remember, warm colors advance, cool colors recede. Here are some premium paints!

start.text: Sculpture is about bringing life to clay and stone. My workshop covers hand-building and tool techniques. Ready to get your hands dirty for $25?

take_class.text: Excellent! Feel the clay, understand its nature. Sculpture teaches patience and vision. Here are professional sculpting tools!

options.text: I can feel the difference already!

start.text: The forest whispers of ancient artistry... I sense creative energy within you. The deeper woods hold secrets for those pure of heart.

secrets.text: Natural pigments flow through these woods, and there's a sacred clearing where art comes alive. But only those who respect nature's balance may find them.

blessing.text: Your spirit is pure. The forest blesses your journey. May your art flourish like the wildflowers.

start.text: I've been painting nature here for decades. This clearing has perfect light and inspiration. The pond reflects colors like nowhere else.

options.text: Can you teach me about plein air painting?

teach_plein_air.text: Painting outdoors teaches you to see light as it truly is - always changing, always alive. Here, take this field easel as a gift.

end.text: Paint what you feel, not just what you see.

start.text: This ancient easel hums with magical energy. Paintings created here seem to come alive with extraordinary beauty.

options.text: Try painting on the mystical easel.

use_easel.text: As you paint, the colors seem to glow and dance. Your artwork transcends the ordinary - this is truly magical!

end.text: The easel awaits the next inspired artist...

start.text:
COMMUNITY QUEST BOARD 

 Art School Tours Available!
 Forest Expeditions Forming
 Mystical Art Challenges
 Master Artist Competitions

options.text: Take on the Art School Challenge

school_quest.text: ART SCHOOL EXPLORATION: Visit all three studio classrooms and take at least one class. Reward: Advanced supplies and networking boost!

forest_quest.text: DEEP FOREST EXPEDITION: Explore the forest depths, find the mystical clearing, and discover the hidden grove. Reward: Rare materials and nature's blessing!

mystical_quest.text: MYSTICAL ART CHALLENGE: Create an enchanted artwork using the mystical easel hidden deep in the forest. Reward: ???

end.text: Good luck with your artistic journey!

start.text: Greetings, artist! I'm always looking for unique pieces to add to my collection. Do you have anything to sell?

sell_pencil_sketch.text: Ah, a classic! Here's $10 for your sketch.

sell_watercolor_painting.text: A delightful watercolor! $45 for this piece.

sell_oil_painting.text: Exquisite oil work! This is worth $150.

sell_clay_sculpture.text: A strong form in clay! $80 for your sculpture.

end.text: Do come back if you create more masterpieces!
